200.html:
data

[object]

The Application Security exclusion filter response data.

attributes

object

The attributes of the Application Security exclusion filter.

description

string

A description for the exclusion filter.

enabled

boolean

Indicates whether the exclusion filter is enabled.

ip_list

[string]

The IPs list for the exclusion filter.

metadata

object

Metadata about the exclusion filter.

added_at

date-time

The timestamp when the exclusion filter was added.

added_by

string

The email address of the user who added the exclusion filter.

modified_at

date-time

The timestamp when the exclusion filter was last modified.

modified_by

string

The email address of the user who last modified the exclusion filter.

parameters

[string]

A list of parameters for the exclusion filter.

path_glob

string

The path glob for the exclusion filter.

rules_target

[object]

A list of rules targeted by the exclusion filter.

tags

object

Tags identifying the category and type of the targeted rule.

category

string

The category of the rule.

type

string

The type of the rule.

scope

[object]

The scope of the exclusion filter.

env

string

The environment scope for the exclusion filter.

service

string

The service scope for the exclusion filter.

id

string

The ID of the Exclusion filter.

type

enum

The type of the resource. The value should always be exclusion_filter. Allowed enum values: exclusion_filter

default: exclusion_filter
